titles.title: Täʾamrä Maryam "Miracles of Mary" / Täʾamrä Mikaʾel "Miracles of Michael"

shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Täʾamrä Maryam "Miracles of Mary" (fols. 2ra-94ra) I-1) O rǝḫrǝḫtä ḥǝllina... "O tender-hearted..." (fols. 2ra-3vb) (cp. ChRep no. 368) I-2) ʾƎsäggǝd läki wä-ʾǝweddǝsäki... "I worship Thee..." (fols. 3vb-4rb) I-3) Introductory exhortation (fols. 4va-5va) I-4) Mäṣḥafä śǝrʿat, Introductory rite of al-Muʿallaqah (fols. 5va-9vb) I-5) Täʾamrä Maryam "Miracles of Mary": 60 miracles (fols. 11ra-94ra) II) Täʾamrä Mikaʾel "Miracles of Michael": 3 miracles (fols. 94ra-100ra)
Additiones 1-2.

nmcopyists.nmcopyist: The scribe's name has been erased (fol. 9va).

donors.donor: The name of the original donor, Qerǝllos, has been erased throughout the Ms., but is preserved on fols. 15vb and 93va (in the latter case together with the names of his wife Wälättä Śǝllase and his father Kǝflä ʾIyäsus). Several names, like Gäbrä Täklä Haymanot, Gäbrä ʾIyäsus, Wälättä Muse, have been inserted into supplication formuals by a secondary hand (see also Additio 2).

txstates.txstate: The manuscript is worn. The Ms. has been resewn (the cover was cut off from the spine). The stub after the last folio seems to be a remnant of a bifolio's counterpart.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards, covered with reddish brown tooled leather (partly missing). Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the reddish brown leather cover is poorly visible (at least 4 tools were used: triple line fillet, interlaced line fillet, double circle, cross hatching).

bnothers.bnother: Small holes and tears are visible on the spine fold of the quires, close to the head and the tail of the codex.

txfolios.txfolio: (100+1) Foliation mistake: number 42 is given twice (the image has got number 42a).

squires.squire: A(1; s.l.: 1, stub before 1/fols. 1r-v) – I(5; s.l.: 3, stub after 3/fols. 2r-6v) – II(4/fol. 7r-10v) – III(8/fols. 11r-18v) – IV(8/fols. 19r-26v) – V(8/fols. 27r-34v) – VI(8/fols. 35r-42av) – VII(8/fols. 42br-49v) – VIII(8/fols. 50r-57v) – IX(8/fols. 58r-65v) – X(8/fols. 66r-73v) – XI(8/fols. 74r-81v) – XII(4/fol. 82r-89v) – XIII(8/fols. 90r-97v) – IV(3; s.l.: 1, stub after 3/fols. 98r-100v)

taunit.rl-info:
Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.
The scribe did not use the bottom ruled line on fols. 36v-38v, 40rv.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; names of the donors (erased); a few lines (alternating with black lines) on the incipit page of Texts I and II and of all sections of Text I; first word of each strophe of Text I-1; section numbers of Text I-5; elements of the punctuation signs and of the text dividers; Ethiopic numerals (in Text I-5) or their elements.

otherdetails.otherdetail:
Text I-1 is known as Mälkǝʿa śǝʿǝl "Image of the Icon" within the Mälkǝʿa gubaʾe "Collection of Images".
The miracles of Mary (Texts I-5) are numbered (number 22 is missing). Some of the miracles are followed by a short hymn: - ኦእግዝእትየ፡ ማርያም፡ ጽዋዓ፡ ልቡና፡ መለኮታዊ። ... (fol. 15vb) - ኦእግዝእትየ፡ ማርያም፡ ገይበ፡ ወርቅ፡ ምቅዳሐ፡ ሀሊብ። ... (fol. 16va-vb) - ኦእግዝእትየ፡ ማርያም፡ ባሕርየ፡ ዘአልብኪ፡ ሤጠ፡ ወተውላጠ። ... (fol. 19ra) - ኦእግዝእትየ፡ ማርያም፡ ሰዊተ፡ ወይን፡ ዘመዋዕለ፡ ቀሥም። ... (fol. 20rb-va) - ኦእግዝእትየ፡ ማርያም፡ መጽሔት፡ ጽድልት፡ ዘኢትዴመኒ። ... (fol. 21rb) - ኦእግዝእትየ፡ ማርያም፡ በለሰ፡ ርጢን፡ ዘነጋሢ። ... (fol. 22rb) - ኦእግዝእትየ፡ ማርያም፡ መሠረተ፡ አሚን፡ ወፍጻሜ። ... (fol. 24rb) - ኦእግዝእትየ፡ ማርያም፡ ጎሐ፡ ጽባሕ፡ ብርህት፡ እንተ፡ ወለድኪ፡ ፀሐየ። ... (fol. 28va) - ኦእግዝእትየ፡ ቅድስት፡ ድንግል፡ በክልኤ፡ ማርያም፡ ጥዕምተ፡ ሰም፡ ሕይወተ፡ ዘለዓለም። ... (fol. 30va) - ኦእግዝእትየ፡ ማርያም፡ ልብስ፡ ንጽሕት፡ ዘኢትትወሀብ፡ ለዘኢትደልዎ። ... (fol. 33rb-va) - ኦእግዝእትየ፡ ማርያም፡ በትረ፡ መንግሥት፡ ዘእምሥርወ፡ ይሁዳ። ... (fol. 35ra-rb) - ኦእግዝእትየ፡ ማርያም፡ ሀገረ፡ ፀወን፡ ዘኢያንቀለቅል፡ መሠረታ። ... (fol. 49ra-rb)
Short, rhymed subscriptio (supplication for the scribe) is written on fol. 100ra.

additional.cont: Fol. 1ra: Excerpt from Säˁatat zä-lelit "Horologium for the Night".

additional.det: The note, written over erasure, states that the Ms. was purchased by Gäbrä Täklä Haymanot whose father was Gäbrä ʾIyäsus.

extras.extra: - Omissions are inserted interlineally: e.g., fols. 5rb, 14ra, 15ra, 28ra, 35ra, 43vb, 46vb, 88ra or in the margin: fols. 5rb, 12va, 41rb. - Corrections are written over erasures: e.g., fols. 2ra, 16ra, 89ra. - Erasures marked with lines: fols. 2rb, 4vb, 15va, 23ra, 25va, 29ra, 43ra, 55rb, 56rb. - Pen trial: fol. 1r. - Scribbles: fols. 4r, 7v.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: Readings are indicated by the names of the feasts or months, written in the upper margin in pen: fols. 25vb, 27rb, 55rb, 57r, 78va, 85vb, 92va.

miniature.info: Fol. 9vb: St. George slaying the dragon.
Fol. 10r: The Virgin and Child with the archangels Michel and Gabriel.
miniature.details: Legend, written red: ሚካኤል፡ "Michael". ምስለ፡ ፍቁር፡ ወልዳ ፡ "with her beloved Son". ገብርኤል፡ "Gabriel".

miniature.info: Fol. 10v: Saints Täklä Haymanot and ʾƎwosṭatewos.
miniature.details: Legend, written red: አባ፡ ተክለ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ ወአባ፡ ኤዎስጣቴዎስ፡ "ʾabba Täklä Haymanot and ʾEwosṭatewos". The legend has been partly erased.

frames.frame: Fol. 11r (incipit page of Text I-5): coloured (red, black) ornamental band; geometric and floral motifs, crosses. Fol. 94ra (incipit page of Text II): simple coloured (red, black) ornamental band; geometric and floral motifs. Simple coloured (red and black) ornamental bands with different motifs are drawn throughout Text I dividing some of the sections (fols. 4ra, 40va, 70ra, 75vb, 84rb, 88vb).
